column4: Hey Guy's I just have a quick question here, I have a Nvidea Gforce Fx 5700LE With DVI and VGA and i was wondering if UBUNTU supports Dual Screen for that video card? Is there anything I need t download in buntu to get it to work? becuase it just says that there is no connection on my DVI monitor
IfI can get that to work im gonna make the switch from windows!
dual screen works out of the box with nvidia-settings
